Hey Sarah,
Thanks for reaching out. I've removed the $20 discount offer as requested.

The newsletter sign-up section now reads:
SIGN UP TO OUR NEWSLETTER
Subscribe to our newsletter today and keep up to date with all of the latest offers and discounts.

You can view it live here:
https://kodilo.com.au/

Feel free to let us know if there's anything else we can assist with.

full_threads.body:
Hi Andy and team

Our team are struggling to operationalise the $20 discount - its manual
today through the invoice system

*Remove the $20 discount offer *

Please update the below -

SIGN UP TO OUR NEWSETTER
Subscribe to our newsletter today and keep up to date with all of the
latest offers and discounts.


*IT MUST BE KEPT OPERATONAL WHEN PURCHASING FOR THE NEXT MONTH TO HONOUR
THE CODES SENT LAST WEEK. *

Thanks

Sarah



Sarah Fairweather
General Manager
